name: LLC VelvetDev
description:
Who we are
VelvetDev is a Drupal Development company that specialized in portals, social Network, and E-commerce sites. Drupal is our passion. Drupal is our life. Drupal is our everything.
What we love to do
Drupal 7 to Drupal 8 upgrade
Drupal development
Web development
Website maintenance
Web design
Support
Web development services to end customers
How do we work
We are open for every possible form of collaboration: we would love to drink a cup of tea with you in our cozy office, but we are also ready to visit you in your country and have a nice chat about great future projects. But we can work as outsource developers as well. Just choose the best variant for you and let's start to execute your ideas!
READ MORE...
